Name: Validate  login with invalid credentials.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Navigate to the sign-in page.

Enter an invalid email with a valid password and Click the "Sign In" 
button.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: An error message is displayed: "Please enter a valid email address".

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step:
Enter a valid email address with an incorrect password and Click the "Sign 
In" button.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: An error message is displayed: "Incorrect email or password".

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Leave the email or password fields empty and Click the "Sign In" button.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
Error messages are displayed: "Email is required" and "Password is 
required".

Name: Validate Editing Order in the Orders Card with invalid data.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Navigate to the sign-in page.
Enter a valid email address and password.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: Password displays with secure masking.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Check the "Remember Me" checkbox.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: "Remember Me" checkbox is displayed correctly.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Check the "Forgot Password" link.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: "Forgot Password" link is displayed correctly.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Check for "Gazara Logo".
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: Gazara logo is displayed prominently at the top of the page.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Check for a Welcome Text.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: A welcome text under the logo, greeting the super admin is displayed

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Click the "Sign In" button.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: The super admin is redirected to the dashboard page.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Click the "Edit" button or icon for an order in the Orders Card table.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: Allows modification of order details.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Attempt to Enter existing Order ID.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: Error Message Appears.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Attempt to Enter Future Date.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: Error Message Appears.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Attempt to Enter non-existing Customer Name.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: Error Message Appears.

Name: Validate Add a New Product with Missing Required Fields
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Log in as the super admin.

Click on each tab in the sidebar (Dashboard, Orders, Users, Admins, 
Payments, Settings, and an option to switch to dark/light mode).
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
Dashboard is default active tab.
The respective page loads correctly for each tab.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Toggle the dark/light mode switch in the sidebar.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: The dashboard theme changes accordingly and persists across sessions.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Clicks the "Product Tab" in the sidebar.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
Verify Table Displays Correctly with (10 products by default at a time and 
navigation arrows to browse products 10 by 10).

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step:
Verify Table Displays Correctly with  (Product Name, Price, Quantity) 
Columns.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
The table displays correctly with Product Names, correct Prices and 
Quantities.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Verify Table Displays Correctly with Status Columns.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
The table displays tags indicating whether the product is In Stock (green 
tag) or Out of Stock (red tag).

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Verify Table Displays Correctly with Action Columns.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
The table Provides the following options as clickable buttons or icons: 
"View", "Edit", "Delete".

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Click the "View" button or icon.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: A detailed view of the selected product is displayed.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Click the "Edit" button or icon.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: Allows modification of product details.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Click the "Delete" button or icon.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: The product is removed from the table.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Verify Table Displays Correctly with Search Bar.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
The table Displays with Search Bar Allows the super admin to search for 
specific products by name.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Verify Table Displays Correctly with Filter Option.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
The table Enables filtering of products by attributes: "Product category" 
,"Price range", "Status".

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Verify Table Displays Correctly with "Add New Product" Button.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: The table Provides an option to add a new product to the table.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Verify Table Displays Correctly with Pagination Summary.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
The table displays a text showing the current range of products being 
viewed at the bottom of the card.
Format: "Showing (10) out of (150) products" (with dynamic values).

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Verify Table Displays Correctly with Rows Per Page Option.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
The table Provides a dropdown menu to change the number of products 
displayed per page, with options for:
"10 products (default)", "20 products", "30 products", "All products".

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Click "Add New Product" button.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
Displays a breadcrumb trail at the top of the card indicating the current 
location: "Products > Add New Product".

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Leave required fields blank.
Click "Add" button.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: Error messages appear for each missing required field.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Log in as the super admin.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
The table Provides the following options as clickable buttons or icons:

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Click the "View" button or icon.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: A detailed view of the selected product is displayed.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Click the "Edit" button or icon.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: Allows modification of product details.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Click the "Delete" button or icon.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: The product is removed from the table.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Verify Table Displays Correctly with Search Bar.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
The table Displays with Search Bar Allows the super admin to search for 
specific products by name.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Verify Table Displays Correctly with Filter Option.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
The table Enables filtering of products by attributes: "Product category" 
,"Price range", "Status".

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Verify Table Displays Correctly with "Add New Product" Button.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: The table Provides an option to add a new product to the table.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Verify Table Displays Correctly with Pagination Summary.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
The table displays a text showing the current range of products being 
viewed at the bottom of the card.
Format: "Showing (10) out of (150) products" (with dynamic values).

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Verify Table Displays Correctly with Rows Per Page Option.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
The table Provides a dropdown menu to change the number of products 
displayed per page, with options for:
"10 products (default)", "20 products", "30 products", "All products".

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Click "Add New Product" button.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
Displays a breadcrumb trail at the top of the card indicating the current 
location: "Products > Add New Product".

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Enter Product Name.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: Required Product Name Field Accepts Text input for the name of the product.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Select Product Category.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
Required Product Category Field Provides Dropdown menu with the following 
options: "Seafood", "Salads", "Meats", "Veggies", "Fruits".

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Enter Product Price.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
Required Product Price Field Accepts Numeric input for the product's price 
in EGP LE.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Enter Product Quantity.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
Required Product Quantity Field Accepts Numeric input for the quantity of 
the product.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Enter Product Discount.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
Optional Product Discount Field Accepts Numeric input for applying a 
discount.
Default Value: 0 if left blank.
Discount Format Options: "Percentage (%)" or "Fixed Amount EGP LE 
(selectable by the super admin)".

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Enter Product HSN.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
Required Product HSN Field Accepts Numeric input for a 6-digit code 
required for product export.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Enter Product Status.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
Required Product Status Field Provides Dropdown menu with two options: "In 
Stock" and "Out of Stock".

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Upload Photo.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
Required Product Photo Field Provides Drag-and-drop area or file selection 
button to upload a product image in Supported Formats: .jpeg, .png.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Click "Add" button.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: Proceed to the review page.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Click "Cancel" button.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
Cancels the action and redirects the user back to the Products Page without 
saving changes.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Attempt to upload unsupported file format (.docx).
Click "Add" button.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: Error message appears "Only .jpeg and .png files are supported".

Name: Validate Search for non-existing user
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Log in as the super admin.

Click on each tab in the sidebar (Dashboard, Orders, Users, Admins, 
Payments, Settings, and an option to switch to dark/light mode).
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
Dashboard is default active tab.
The respective page loads correctly for each tab.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Toggle the dark/light mode switch in the sidebar.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: The dashboard theme changes accordingly and persists across sessions.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Clicks the "Users Tab" in the sidebar.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
The table displays the columns:
1. User Name: Full name of the user.
2. Mobile Number: User's contact number.
3. Email Address: User's registered email.
4. Address: Full address of the user.
5. Action: "View", "Edit", "Delete" Icons or Buttons with correct 
functionality.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Verify the "Filter" Button.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
A Filter Button located in the top-right corner of the card to filter user 
records by region.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Verify the Search Bar Functionality.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: A Search Bar allows the super admin to search for a specific user.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Verify Pagination and Record Displaying and functionality.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
At the bottom of the table:
1. Display the current page number and total pages.
2. arrows to navigate between pages.
3. Option to select the number of records displayed per page.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Enter non-existing user name in Search Bar.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: No thing Displays.

Name: Validate Add a New Admin with invalid data
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Log in as the super admin.

Click on each tab in the sidebar (Dashboard, Orders, Users, Admins, 
Payments, Settings, and an option to switch to dark/light mode).
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
Dashboard is default active tab.
The respective page loads correctly for each tab.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Toggle the dark/light mode switch in the sidebar.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: The dashboard theme changes accordingly and persists across sessions.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Clicks the "Admin Tab" in the sidebar.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
The table displays the columns:
1- Name: sorts and displays Full name of the admin/supervisor.
2. Branch Region: sorts and displays The branch the admin is assigned to.
3. Email Address: sorts and displays Contact email of the admin.
4. Role: Displays the role of the admin (e.g., Branch Manager, Assistant 
Manager).
5. Action: "View", "Edit", "Delete" Icons or Buttons with correct 
functionality.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Verify the "Filter" Button.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: Located at the top-right corner of the card.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Verify the Search Bar Functionality.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: A Search Bar allows searching for a specific admin.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Verify the "Add Admin" Button.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: Located at the top-left of the card.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Verify the "Download" Button.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: Located at the top-right of the card, next to the Filter Button.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Verify Pagination and Record Displaying and functionality.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
At the bottom of the table:
1. Display the current page number and total pages.
2. arrows to navigate between pages.
3. Option to select the number of records displayed per page.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Click "Add Admin" button.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: Opens a form where the super admin can add a new admin/supervisor.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Enter invalid Email Address.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: Error message appears.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Enter invalid Phone Number.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: Error message appears.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Leave required fields blank and click "Submit" button.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: Error message appears for missing fields.

Name: Validate Search for invalid payment data
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Log in as the super admin.

Click on each tab in the sidebar (Dashboard, Orders, Users, Admins, 
Payments, Settings, and an option to switch to dark/light mode).
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
Dashboard is default active tab.
The respective page loads correctly for each tab.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Toggle the dark/light mode switch in the sidebar.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: The dashboard theme changes accordingly and persists across sessions.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Clicks the "Payment Tab" in the sidebar.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
The table displays the columns:
1. Transaction ID (TXID): Non-editable and sortable unique identifiers 
generated using precise timestamps (millisecond or microsecond).
2. Customer Name: Sortable names of the customers who made the transaction.
3. Date: Sortable precise date and time of the transaction initiation.
4. Type: Indicates the Sortable payment method.
5. Action: "View", "Refund", "Delete" Icons or Buttons with correct 
functionality.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Verify the "Filter" Button.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: Located at the top-right corner of the card.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Verify the Search Bar Functionality.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
A Search Bar allows searching for a specific Transaction ID, Customer Name, 
or Date.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Verify the "Download" Button.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: Located at the top-right of the card, next to the Filter Button.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Verify Pagination and Record Displaying and functionality.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
At the bottom of the table:
1. Display the current page number and total pages.
2. arrows to navigate between pages.
3. Option to select the number of records displayed per page.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Enter invalid data in Search Bar.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: Display a message "No transactions found for the selected criteria".
